text: {{Infobox settlement | official_name = Andelfingen District | native_name = Bezirk Andelfingen | settlement_type = District | image_map = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type2 = Canton | subdivision_name2 = | subdivision_type3 = Capital | subdivision_name3 = Andelfingen | area_total_km2 = 166.64 | area_footnotes = | population_as_of = | population_total = | population_footnotes = | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone = CET | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = CEST | utc_offset_DST = +2 | blank_name_sec1 = Municipalities | blank_info_sec1 = 22 }} Andelfingen is one of the twelve districts of the German-speaking canton of Zürich, Switzerland. == Municipalities == Andelfingen contains 24 municipalities: Municipality Population (31 Dec 2005) Area, km² Adlikon 560 6.71 Andelfingen 1703 6.65 Benken 742 5.67 Berg am Irchel 603 7.06 Buch am Irchel 797 10.26 Dachsen 1740 2.69 Dorf 630 5.55 Feuerthalen 3214 2.49 Flaach 1178 10.16 Flurlingen 1375 2.40 Henggart 1854 3.01 Humlikon 427 3.70 Kleinandelfingen 1943 10.36 Laufen-Uhwiesen 1473 6.27 Marthalen 1797 14.11 Oberstammheim 1079 9.36 Ossingen 1296 13.07 Rheinau 1308 8.96 Thalheim an der Thur 709 6.44 Trüllikon 977 9.52 Truttikon 472 4.42 Unterstammheim 890 7.32 Volken 294 3.21 Waltalingen 695 7.25 Total 27,756 166.64 Category:Andelfingen District
